mapper.insert: insert into user (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, name, work_company, position, title, phone, email, role, password, source, version, deleted, attributes ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attributes,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
